text: Computing Signatures for many Sets at once * SIG — matrix with SIG(i,S) = i entry of the signature of S « Initialize SIG(i,S) = ooforalliand S ¢ Let U = setof all elements in all sets S fors € U do Compute hy(s), hy(s), ..., hi(s) for each set S do if s € S then fori € {1,..,k}do SIG(i, S) « min{h;(s), SIG(i, S)}
